Pre-Game Insights: India are one of the only two teams in this World Cup who did not lose a game.
India’s T20 World Cup 2024 journey has been a strange one. They do not have any batter who features in the top 15 run-scorers of the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2024.
Playing all the group games on the tricky surfaces of New York and Florida had an impact on their batting.
Bangladesh also found the same relief from their bowling unit which has been rather brilliant so far.
Bangladesh’s batting is out of form at this moment. It seems like they just cannot find a way to click at this point.
India can rely on their batting now after scoring 181 against a solid Afghanistan bowling attack.
All of their batters scored at an excellent strike rate except for skipper Rohit Sharma.
India’s opening pair which consists of two of the greatest hitters of the generation but yet not clicking.
Bangladesh has been largely reliant on their bowlers to get a result in this World Cup.
Bangladesh team need Mustafizur Rahman to step up once again and dominate the Indian batters.
Litton Kumer Das also loves performing against India.
Bangladesh fans will hope for Litton Das to bring that Adelaide innings from the 2022 T20 World Cup at Antigua this time.
